casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Max Tracy EARLS 227P14-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Amar Majmundar, Senior Deputy Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Max Tracy Earls, for Earls, Max Tracy.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of July 2018 by Defendant for Review of a Constitutional Question:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
